title: #1591 I'll Help and Hurt Your Point
itunes:title: #1591 I'll Help and Hurt Your Point
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew continue their conversation from the last episode as vexing pictures of the building Adam was looking for are revealed, getting Adam frustrated with a past Carolla Digital employee's instincts. They then turn to the phones and speak to a variety of callers including one with questions about Covid vaccines for very young children, another with some very interesting insight on the Johnny Depp 'Crybaby' motorcycle making headlines lately. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
The Jordan Harbinger Show
GuruNanda.com/Win
